name: Fan: The Game
description:
From the makers of Sultan: The Game and Dhoom: 3 The Game, now play the Official Game for SHAH RUKH KHAN STARRER – FAN BY YASH RAJ FILMS PVT.LTD.

Charm, Bluff, Sneak and Strike your way to meet Aryan in this fascinating game of Connections! Connect with your star at Mannat or in the Studio, in a Cinema Hall or in simply any Mall.

Do you want to have a stronger connection with your superstar? Kya Aap Ho Duniya Ke Sabse Bade Superstar ke Sabse Bade Fan? Find out in Fan: The Game

Game Features:
• Exciting Puzzles - Easy to play, hard to master!
• Adventurous Levels - Over 165 intriguing levels
• Beat your Friends - Get to the top of the Leaderboards
• Dazzling Graphics - Will leave you wanting for more
• Bewitching Boosters - To help you outdo your buddies

Learn More at http://www.fanthegame.com
Watch the Trailer at https://youtu.be/4kuU3reRE_k
Like the “Fan The Game’ page on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/fanthegame
Follow “Fan The Game’ page on Twitter - https://twitter.com/fanthegame
Follow “Fan The Game’ page on Instagram - http://instagram.com/fanthegameofficial/

Facing issues while playing Fan: The Game or have any suggestions/feedback? We would love to hear from you –Email us at support@99games.in

FAN: The Game is Free-to-Play, but some items like Virtual Currency can be purchased with real-world money. FAN: The Game may contain sponsored messages from 3rd Party Advertising partners - you can learn more here - https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices
